forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High around 10C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending this morning. Remaining cloudy. High around 50F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds this evening. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 37F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 48F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High near 10C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 49F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 53F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 48F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
